name: id
description: Description: The ID of the report in the database.

name: action_taken
description: Description: Whether an action was taken yet.

name: action_taken_at
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 8601 Datetime) or null
description: Description: When an action was taken against the report.

name: category
description: Description: The generic reason for the report.

name: comment
description: Description: The reason for the report.

name: forwarded
description: Description: Whether the report was forwarded to a remote domain.

name: created_at
description: Description: When the report was created.

name: status_ids
type: Type: NULLABLE Array of String (cast from integer), or null
description: Description: IDs of statuses that have been attached to this report for additional context.

name: rule_ids
type: Type: NULLABLE Array of String (cast from integer), or null
description: Description: IDs of the rules that have been cited as a violation by this report.

name: target_account
description: Description: The account that was reported.
